title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: At the Cloch lighthouse, one of the most important beacons on the Clyde, the coast bends southwards to lunerkip,* which occupies a sequestered situation at the mouth of the Kip river. The mansion of Ardgowan, the seat of Sir Michael Robert Shaw Stewart, Eart., stands at the head of the bay, and consists of an old tower, with large modern additions.

title: A selection from the correspondence of the late Thomas Chalmers /
author: Chalmers, Thomas
snippet: CIX. Ardgowan, 27th October, 1836. My dear Mrs. Parker— I can not say it was officious, butI must say it was greatly overkind of you to pay the noddy.
